t: I’ve been delivering with Amazon Flex for 6 years. Here’s what it’s like.
s: October 18, 2024 - Every Monday, Amazon Flex drivers arrive at West Seattle Food Bank to pick up boxes of healthy food to deliver them to families and individuals in need, for free. Delivering with Flex has been a great way to keep a good flow of money coming in while keeping my schedule flexible.
